imdb.title: Mawaru-Penguindrum
imdb.plot: A terminally ill girl is revived by a magical penguin spirit. In return, her brothers are sent on a quest for the mysterious 'Penguindrum'.

episodes.title: The Bell of Fate Tolls
episodes.plot: Terminally ill Himari Takakura is healed by a magic penguin hat, to the joy of her brothers Kanba and Shoma... then they learn the terms of her revival.

episodes.title: A Risky Survival Strategy
episodes.plot: Kanba and Shoma are tasked with tracking Ringo Oginome, a young girl with a special diary that may be the key to finding the Penguindrum.

episodes.title: Then Devour Me Curry-geously
episodes.plot: Ringo decides to make a special curry for her crush Tabuki, while at the same time Shoma and Kanba break into her house to get her Fate diary.

episodes.title: A Princess Descends
episodes.plot: Ringo schemes to have everything in place for the perfect afternoon with Tabuki. Unfortunately, nothing goes the way she plans.

episodes.title: This is What Drives Me
episodes.plot: Shoma invites Ringo to his house, and tells her everything outright. This leads to Ringo disposing of Himari's hat, and Kanba starts a desperate search to get it back.

episodes.title: You and I are Bound B M
episodes.plot: When Kanba is summoned to a meeting with several of his ex-girlfriends, they are attacked by a mysterious sniper. Meanwhile, Shoma helps Ringo move to her new home under Tabuki's apartment.

episodes.title: The Eggchanting Girl
episodes.plot: Ringo and Shoma attend one of Yuri's plays. Afterwards, they are invited to a party, where Yuri makes a shocking announcement.

episodes.title: Even if Your Love is a Lie, I...
episodes.plot: With Ringo's planned 'first-night' with Tabuki failing to eventuate, the destiny she had desired seems to be slipping away from her. In a last ditch effort to bring 'Project M' to fruition, she concocts a cunning plan.

episodes.title: Frozen World
episodes.plot: Himari has a strange dream in which she encounters a mysterious librarian named Sanetoshi, who tends to a library apparently housing her memories.

episodes.title: Because I Love Him
episodes.plot: Shoma is visited by Ringo and his siblings as he recovers in hospital. After he is kidnapped by Masako, Kanba's attempt to rescue him leads him into a surreal labyrinth.

episodes.title: You Have Finally Realized It
episodes.plot: Kanba confronts Masako in an attempt to obtain Ringo's diary. Ringo decides to continue Project M, with or without her diary and Shoma's assistance.

episodes.title: The Wheel That Spins Us 'Round
episodes.plot: As Himari suddenly loses her strength, Shoma remembers how the Takakura parents carried out a terrorist attack that killed Ringo's sister Momoka.

episodes.title: Crime and Punishment for You and Me
episodes.plot: Just as Kanba gives in to despair, Sanetoshi appears to him with an offer he cannot refuse.

episodes.title: The Princess of Lies
episodes.plot: When Shouma leaves Ringo distraught by deciding the two should not see each other anymore, Yuri offers to help her get over him with a visit to a hot-spring resort.

episodes.title: Savior of the World
episodes.plot: Yuri uses Ringo to capture Shoma and force him to get Himari's diary, so she can bring back the only friend she ever had in a troubled life - Momoka.

episodes.title: The Immortal Man
episodes.plot: After a battle with Yuri, Masako thinks back to her life - the tyrannical tycoon grandfather who raised her, and the numerous murders she attempted to be rid of him.

episodes.title: The Unforgiven
episodes.plot: Yuri and Masako battle over Ringo's diary, while Tabuki takes Himari hostage to get revenge on the children of Takakura for the death of Momoka.

episodes.title: So Please Be with Me
episodes.plot: Tabuki remembers how Momoka saved his life as a child. Kanba and Shoma arrive and have a standoff with Tabuki.

episodes.title: My Fated One
episodes.plot: Masako appears incognito and revives suppressed memories within Himari, showing her she is adopted and who her true soulmate is.

episodes.title: Thank You for Choosing Me
episodes.plot: Shoma tells Ringo how, when the Takakuras were out to change the world, they took in an orphan girl named Himari.

episodes.title: The Door of Fate That We Choose
episodes.plot: After an encounter with a journalist, Himari makes a shocking discovery about Kanba's parents, and swears to save Kanba. Tabuki and Yuri are attacked.

episodes.title: Beautiful Coffin
episodes.plot: Kanba goes ahead with his plan to save Himari no matter what it might cost, despite Himari and Masako's appeals. Yuri returns Momoka's diary to Ringo.

episodes.title: The Destination of Fate
episodes.plot: Finally Shoma comes head to head with Kanba, determined to stop him.

episodes.title: I Love You
episodes.plot: The Penguindrum is finally revealed, and Himari and Ringo are saved... but at what cost?
